A couple walks by a row of closed motels, Wednesday, April 29, 2020, in Old Orchard Beach, Maine. Gov. Janet Mills on Tuesday announced tentatives plans to allow for lodging, campgrounds and the reopening of bars on July 1. Many businesses have been closed by the coronavirus pandemic. less A couple walks by a row of closed motels, Wednesday, April 29, 2020, in Old Orchard Beach, Maine. Gov.
